Title: Web UI Automation
Description: Web UI Automation library help automate web interface input/output using C#.Net code. It also help test the Web UI using C#.Net code
HomeWiki:
Web UI Automation library provides classes and methods to support the automation of Web based user interface. Web UI Automation help you provide input on a website and execute the events of website input/command controls.


Web UI Automation library provides AutomaticWebRequest and AutomationElement. AutomaticWebRequest help you create a web request by providing the URL of the website/Web UI. AutomaticWebRequest constructor take URL as the parameter. This class does not support default and any other constructor. AutomaticWebRequest also support two important methods...

 

- SetAutomationElement : which help you set the elements which will be a part of Web UI Automation

- ExecuteNextStep : This method help you set attribute value on each element and also execute event on each elements specified in Element collection

 

I hope this post will help you in some or the other way.

You can also find some interesting content on techblogster.
